name: cursorless
description: Don't let the cursor slow you down

colors.description: Background color to use for ranges about to be deleted
Background color to use for ranges that are being referenced
Background color to use for ranges that have just been added
Background color to use for ranges that are being changed
Background color to use for ranges that are being changed

cursorless.showOnStart.description: Whether to show decorations on vscode start.

cursorless.pendingEditDecorationTime.description: How long in milliseconds to show a pending edit decoration

cursorless.showAdditionalHighlightBefore.description: Whether to show a highlight before scrolling in addition to after

cursorless.hatSizeAdjustment.description: Percentage to increase or decrease hat size; positive increases size

cursorless.hatVerticalOffset.description: How much to vertically shift the hats as a percentage of font size; positive is up

cursorless.colors.default.description: Color to use for default symbols

cursorless.colors.green.description: Color to use for green symbols

cursorless.colors.red.description: Color to use for red symbols

cursorless.colors.yellow.description: Color to use for yellow symbols

cursorless.colors.purple.description: Color to use for purple symbols

cursorless.colors.blue.description: Color to use for blue symbols

cursorless.hatStyles.blue.penalty.description: How much to penalize the blue hat style. Number of syllables is a good default

cursorless.hatStyles.blue.enabled.description: Whether to enable the blue hat style

cursorless.hatStyles.green.penalty.description: How much to penalize the green hat style. Number of syllables is a good default

cursorless.hatStyles.green.enabled.description: Whether to enable the green hat style

cursorless.hatStyles.red.penalty.description: How much to penalize the red hat style. Number of syllables is a good default

cursorless.hatStyles.red.enabled.description: Whether to enable the red hat style

cursorless.hatStyles.yellow.penalty.description: How much to penalize the yellow hat style. Number of syllables is a good default

cursorless.hatStyles.yellow.enabled.description: Whether to enable the yellow hat style

cursorless.hatStyles.purple.penalty.description: How much to penalize the purple hat style. Number of syllables is a good default

cursorless.hatStyles.purple.enabled.description: Whether to enable the purple hat style

cursorless.hatStyles.fourPointStar.penal.description: How much to penalize the fourPointStar hat style. Number of syllables is a good default

cursorless.hatStyles.fourPointStar.enabl.description: Whether to enable the fourPointStar hat style

cursorless.hatStyles.threePointStar.pena.description: How much to penalize the threePointStar hat style. Number of syllables is a good default

cursorless.hatStyles.threePointStar.enab.description: Whether to enable the threePointStar hat style

cursorless.hatStyles.hole.penalty.description: How much to penalize the hole hat style. Number of syllables is a good default

cursorless.hatStyles.hole.enabled.description: Whether to enable the hole hat style

cursorless.hatStyles.frame.penalty.description: How much to penalize the frame hat style. Number of syllables is a good default

cursorless.hatStyles.frame.enabled.description: Whether to enable the frame hat style

cursorless.hatStyles.chevron.penalty.description: How much to penalize the chevron hat style. Number of syllables is a good default

cursorless.hatStyles.chevron.enabled.description: Whether to enable the chevron hat style

cursorless.hatStyles.curve.penalty.description: How much to penalize the curve hat style. Number of syllables is a good default

cursorless.hatStyles.curve.enabled.description: Whether to enable the curve hat style

cursorless.hatStyles.eye.penalty.description: How much to penalize the eye hat style. Number of syllables is a good default

cursorless.hatStyles.eye.enabled.description: Whether to enable the eye hat style

cursorless.individualHatAdjustments.description: Separate adjustments for each hat shape

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile && yarn run lint && yarn run esbuild
